#summary Installation of the JMCNet Full MongoDB Flex Driver

= Details =

Installation is very easy. Just download the last driver swc file ([http://code.google.com/p/jmcnet-full-mongo-flex-driver/download here] and the _JMCNet Commons Library_ swc [http://code.google.com/p/jmcnet/download here]).

Make your build path points to these swc files, and you are ready to use !
